advancements.simplycats.adoption.desc: Where applicable; which is always for cats.
advancements.simplycats.catnip.desc: Logically the first step in all things cats, of course.
advancements.simplycats.checklist.desc: Prepare to welcome your new cat by making sure you have these items on hand.
advancements.simplycats.neuter.desc: Did you know: Unneutered cats are more prone to fighting with other cats, urine marking, and roaming.
advancements.simplycats.root.desc: Shelter Workers do not get paid enough, spare them some emeralds.
advancements.simplycats.spay.desc: Did you know: There are no benefits to allowing a cat to come into heat or have a litter of kittens.
advancements.simplycats.speuter.desc: Did you know: Spaying and neutering is actually beneficial to your cat's health.
advancements.simplycats.tnr.desc: TNR stabilizes feral cat colonies, and improves and protects cats' lives!
book.index_page.info: Hello! This is the index page of the Simply Cats cat book, or at least it will be once finalized. Try sneak right clicking a cat to see their information instead!

chat.info.release_usage: %s has been released of your ownership. Did you say goodbye?
chat.info.remove_home: Removed previously set home spot for %s
chat.info.set_home: %s's home spot has been set to %d, %d, %d
chat.info.tamed_limit_reached: You cannot tame this cat, your limit has been reached!
command.cat_count.return_count: %s has a total of %s tamed cats
command.cat_count.success: Set tamed cat count for %s to %s
config.simplycats.attack_ai.tooltip: Disabling this will not allow cats to attack entities in their prey list, essentially a peaceful mode for cats.
config.simplycats.breeding_limit.tooltip: This number is used to limit cat breeding; if more than this amount of cats are nearby, automatic breeding will be disabled.
config.simplycats.heat_cooldown.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a cat will not go into heat. Default is 16 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.heat_timer.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a cat will be in heat. Default is 2 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.intact_stray_spawns.to: Disable this if you want ALL stray village cats to be fixed (enable for 10% intact cat spawns).
config.simplycats.join_message.tooltip: Enable or disables the join message with a player's cat count.
config.simplycats.kitten_mature_timer.to: Number of minecraft ticks before a kitten becomes an adult. Default is 7 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.male_cooldown.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a male cat will not try to breed after breeding once already. Default is 1/4th a minecraft day.
config.simplycats.pregnancy_timer.toolti: Number of minecraft ticks before a pregnant cat will give birth. Default is 4 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.prey_list.tooltip: This is a list of entities all cats will attack on sight if cat attack AI is enabled.
If you have existing tamed vanilla cats in your world and want to change them to Simply Cats, enable this and restart your minecraft instance.
config.simplycats.stop_vanilla_spawns.to: Disables vanilla cats spawning, set to false to allow them to spawn again.
config.simplycats.tamed_limit.tooltip: Sets a limit of cats each player is allowed to have tamed, setting this to 0 will disable the limit.
config.simplycats.title: Simply Cats Config
config.simplycats.wander_area_limit.tool: When a cat's home is set, this is the distance in blocks they are allowed to roam.
container.cat_bowl.name: Cat Bowl
tooltip.cat_book.usage: Sneak and use on a cat to save their info to this book!
tooltip.certificate_adopt.desc: Right click on an unowned pet to adopt them!
tooltip.certificate_release.desc: Right click on your pet to release ownership.
tooltip.sterilization_potion.usage: Sneak right click a cat to spay or neuter them. This is irreversible!
